Trigger.Name: 死而不僵
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (?<AbilityName>死而不僵|Walking Dead|ウォーキングデッド) from [^:]+? for 10\.00 Seconds\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} ${CasterName}陷入了“死而不僵”效果。
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} 死而不僵 3 <se.1>
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} 死而不僵 2 <se.1>
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} 死而不僵 1 <se.1>

Trigger.Name: 死而不僵解除
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?) loses the effect of (?<AbilityName>死而不僵|Walking Dead|ウォーキングデッド) from [^:]+?\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} “${AbilityName}”被解除了

Trigger.Name: 巨星字幕提醒
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (?<AbilityName>巨星主宰|Giant Dominance|巨星の支配者) from [^:]+? for 10\.00 Seconds\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能CD_发送频道}} ${AbilityName}
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_减伤_发送频道}} ${var:${CasterName}职业} → [${AbilityName}]
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能CD_发送频道}} ${var:${CasterName}职业} [${AbilityName}] 就绪
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_减伤_发送频道}} ${var:${CasterName}职业} → [${AbilityName}]
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能CD_发送频道}} ${var:${CasterName}职业} [${AbilityName}] 就绪
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能_发送频道}} ${var:${CasterName}职业} → [${AbilityName}] → ${var:${TargetName}职业}
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_大技能CD_发送频道}} ${var:${CasterName}职业} [${AbilityName}] 就绪

Trigger.Name: 读条
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}14:.{0,4}:(?<SourceName>[^:]+?) starts using (?<AbilityName>生辰|Ascend|アセンド|复(活|生)|Raise|蘇生|赤复活|Verraise|ヴァルレイズ) on (?<TargetName>[^:]+?)\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_复活_发送频道}} 读条${AbilityName}：${var:${SourceName}职业} → ${var:${TargetName}职业}

Trigger.Name: 判定
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}15:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?):.{0,4}:(?<AbilityName>生辰|Ascend|アセンド|复(活|生)|Raise|蘇生|赤复活|Verraise|ヴァルレイズ):.{8}:(?<TargetName>[^:]+?):

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_复活_发送频道}} ${CasterName}（${var:${CasterName}职业}）→${AbilityName} → ${TargetName}（${var:${TargetName}职业}）
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_复活_发送频道}} ${CasterName}（${var:${CasterName}职业}）MP:${_ffxivparty[${CasterName}].currentmp} 醒梦CD:${numeric:max(round(60-(${_systemtimems}-${var:${CasterName}醒梦})/1000,1),0)}

Trigger.Name: 醒梦
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (醒梦|Lucid Dreaming|ルーシッドドリーム) from [^:]+? for 21\.00 Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 死亡
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}19:(?<name>.+?) was defeated by (?<target>.+?)\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_死亡_发送频道}} ${name}（${var:${name}职业}）死亡。即刻CD:${var:Souma_Defeated_Swiftcast_Party_CD_WHM}${var:Souma_Defeated_Swiftcast_Party_CD_SCH}${var:Souma_Defeated_Swiftcast_Party_CD_AST}${var:Souma_Defeated_Swiftcast_Party_CD_SMN}
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_死亡_发送频道}} ${name}（${var:${name}职业}）死透了。

Trigger.Name: 即刻
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<CasterName>.+?) gains the effect of (即刻咏唱|Swiftcast|迅速魔) from [^:]+? for 10\.00 Seconds\.$

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${CasterName}的背刺打歪了！
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${CasterName}搓兔了，大家一起笑他！
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${CasterName}的龙神附体居然没有打死星核爆，他在想什么啊！

Action.VariableName: 迫害召唤_死亡轮回数量

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${CasterName} 巴哈：真龙波（${var:迫害召唤_真龙波数量}/8） 死亡轮回（${var:迫害召唤_死亡轮回数量}/2）

Trigger.Name: 真龙波
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}00:4[08]2b:亚灵神巴哈姆特咏唱了“真龙波”。

Trigger.Name: 死亡轮回
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}00:4[08]2b:亚灵神巴哈姆特发动了“死亡轮回”。

Action.VariableName: 迫害召唤_死亡轮回数量
迫害召唤_死亡轮回数量

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${CasterName} 不死鸟：赤焰（${var:迫害召唤_赤焰数量}/8） 天启（${var:迫害召唤_天启数量}/2）
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${caster} 原初的解放：裂石飞环（${var:${caster}裂石飞环}/5）
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${CasterName}天语断了，快笑话他！
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${caster} 血乱：（血溅 ${var:${caster}血溅}/5 寂灭 ${var:${caster}寂灭}）

Trigger.Name: 失去嗜血
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<caster>.+?) loses the effect of (嗜血|Blood Weapon|ブラッドウェポン) from

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${caster} 嗜血覆盖战技（${var:${caster}嗜血计数器}/5）

Trigger.Name: 发动
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<TargetName>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (至黑之夜|Blackest Night|ブラックナイト) from (?<CasterName>[^:]+?) for 7\.00 Seconds\.$
Trigger.Description: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<TargetName>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (至黑之夜|Blackest Night|ブラックナイト) from (?<CasterName>[^:]+?) for 7\.00 Seconds\.$ ^.{15}00:(10|08)2b:.*(至黑之夜|Blackest Night|ブラックナイト)

Trigger.Name: 失去
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<TargetName>[^:]+?) loses the effect of (至黑之夜|Blackest Night|ブラックナイト) from
Trigger.Description: ^.{15}1E:.{8}:(?<TargetName>[^:]+?) loses the effect of (至黑之夜|Blackest Night|ブラックナイト) from ^.{15}00:(08b0|1130):.*(至黑之夜|Blackest Night|ブラックナイト)

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} 经过${numeric:${_systemtimems}-${var:${TargetName}获得至黑之夜}}ms，${TargetName}的黑盾消失了。
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${CasterName}${CasterCurrentMp}蓝就打了安魂祈祷，真牛！

Trigger.Name: 占卜
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1[56]:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?):40A8:(Divination|占卜|ディヴィネーション):.{8}:[^:]+?:(?<power>\d)0F:

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_迫害队友_发送频道}} ${CasterName} 的占卜仅有${power}%

Trigger.RegularExpression: You have entered a sanctuary|进入了休息区。|レストエリアに入った！

Trigger.Name: 策动减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (策动|Tactician|タクティシャン) from .+? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 防守之桑巴减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (防守之桑巴|Shield Samba|守りのサンバ) from .+? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 行吟减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (行吟|Troubadour|トルバドゥール) from .+? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 节制减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (节制|Temperance|テンパランス) from .+? for (?<time>5\.00) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 命运之轮减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (命运之轮|Collective Unconscious|運命の輪：効果) from .+? for (?<time>(?:4|19|20)\.[0-9]{2}) Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 野战治疗阵减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (野战治疗阵|Sacred Soil|野戦治療の陣：効果) from .+? for (?<time>[45]\.[0-9]{2}) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 暗黑布道减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (暗黑布道|Dark Missionary|ダークミッショナリー) from .+? for (?<time>15\.00) Seconds\.

Trigger.RegularExpression: You have entered a sanctuary|进入了休息区。|レストエリアに入った！|^.{15}21:........:4000001[026]

Action.VariableName: .*(摆脱|复仇|战栗|直觉|团减|单减).*

Trigger.Name: 武装戍卫减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (武装|Arms Up|パッセージ・オブ・アームズ：効果) from .+? for (?<time>[45]\.[0-9]{2}) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 异想的幻光减伤
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of (..的幻光|Fey Illumination|フェイイルミネーション|Seraphic Illumination|セラフィックイルミネーション) from .+? for (?<time>[\d\.]+) Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 技能判定
Trigger.Description: 木人|伊甸|至尊伊甸|伊甸守护者|虚无行者|厄瑞玻斯的巨腕|利维亚桑|泰坦|极大泰坦|guardian of paradise|エデン・ガーデナー|Voidwalker|ヴォイドウォーカー|the Hand of Erebos|エレボスの巨腕|Leviathan|リヴァイアサン|Titan|タイタン|Titan Maximum|マキシタイタン

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_技能判定_发送频道}} 判定：${CasterName} → ${AbilityName} 减伤：${var:单减_鼓舞}${var:单减_夜占盾}${var:单减_天星夜}${var:单减_炽天的幕帘}${var:单减_雪仇_${CasterName}}${var:单减_牵制_${CasterName}}${var:单减_昏乱_${CasterName}}${var:团减_策动}${var:团减_守之桑巴}${var:团减_行吟}${var:团减_节制}${var:团减_命运之轮}${var:团减_野战治疗阵}${var:团减_异想的幻光}${var:团减_圣光幕帘}${var:团减_武装戍卫}${var:团减_摆脱}${var:团减_暗黑布道}
/${func:tolower:${var:_AT_技能判定_发送频道}} 判定：${CasterName} → ${AbilityName}

Trigger.Name: 攻击判定
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}15:.{8}:(?<BossName>至尊伊甸|伊甸守护者|虚无行者|利维亚桑|泰坦|极大泰坦):.+?:(?<AbilityName>攻击|Unknown_(42D9|413D|3E60|367)):.{8}:(?<TargetName>[^:]+?):.+?:(?<damage>.+?):

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /${func:tolower:${var:_AT_伊甸平A职能_发送频道}} BOSS对 【${var:${TargetName}职业}】 的攻击造成了${numeric:hex2dec(${func:substring(0,4):${func:padleft(48,8):${damage}}})}点伤害！

Folder.Name: 挑衅标记大饼（需要设置Triggernometry排列排序）

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: /mk clear <${_ffxivparty[${CasterName}].order}>
